statements: SELECT * FROM paint_colors
SELECT color_name FROM paint_colors
SELECT hex_code, color_name FROM paint_colors
SELECT color_name, hex_code FROM paint_colors
SELECT * FROM paint_colors WHERE hex_code = 'FF0000'
SELECT color_name FROM paint_colors WHERE hex_code = 'FFFFFF';
SELECT hex_code, color_name FROM paint_colors WHERE color_name = 'Red' ORDER BY hex_code DESC;
SELECT color_name, hex_code FROM paint_colors WHERE color_name LIKE 'B%' AND hex_code IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM paint_colors ORDER BY color_name ASC, hex_code DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT hex_code FROM paint_colors WHERE color_name <> 'Blue';
SELECT * FROM paint_colors;
SELECT color_name, hex_code FROM paint_colors WHERE color_id = 2;
SELECT color_name, hex_code FROM paint_colors ORDER BY color_name DESC;
SELECT pc.color_name, cc.category_name FROM paint_colors pc JOIN color_categories cc ON pc.color_id = cc.category_id;
SELECT color_name, hex_code FROM paint_colors WHERE color_name LIKE 'Blue%';
SELECT color_name, hex_code FROM paint_colors WHERE color_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM paint_colors WHERE color_name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY color_name DESC;
SELECT pc.color_name, cc.category_name FROM paint_colors pc JOIN color_categories cc ON pc.color_id = cc.category_id;
SELECT color_name, hex_code FROM paint_colors WHERE hex_code IN ('FFFFFF', '000000', 'FF0000');
SELECT DISTINCT category_name FROM color_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM colors;
SELECT color_name, hex_code FROM colors WHERE color_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, c.color_name, b.brand_name FROM products JOIN colors c ON products.color_id = c.color_id JOIN brands b ON products.brand_id = b.brand_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%T-shirt%';
SELECT product_id, product_name, b.brand_name FROM products JOIN brands b ON products.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE products.color_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE color_id = 1 AND brand_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, color_name, brand_name FROM products p JOIN colors c ON p.color_id = c.color_id JOIN brands b ON p.brand_id = b.brand_id;
SELECT product_name, hex_code FROM products p JOIN colors c ON p.color_id = c.color_id WHERE p.brand_id = 2;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE color_id = 3 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products;
SELECT color_name, hexadecimal_code FROM paint_colors;
SELECT brand_name, website_url FROM color_brands;
SELECT category_name, description FROM color_categories;
SELECT color_name, quantity FROM color_inventory;
SELECT color_name, brand_name, quantity FROM color_inventory ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT color_name, hexadecimal_code FROM paint_colors;
SELECT category_name, description FROM color_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT brand_name, website_url FROM color_brands WHERE website_url LIKE '%com%';
SELECT color_name, brand_name, quantity FROM color_inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT color_name, brand_name, quantity FROM color_inventory WHERE brand_name = 'BrandXYZ' ORDER BY color_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM paint_colors;
SELECT color_name, hexadecimal_code FROM paint_colors WHERE color_name = 'Blue';
SELECT color_name, quantity, price FROM paint_inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM paint_manufacturers WHERE country_of_origin = 'USA';
SELECT color_name, rating FROM paint_reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM paint_colors ORDER BY color_name DESC;
SELECT category_name, primary_color, secondary_color FROM paint_categories WHERE primary_color='Red';
SELECT manufacturer_name, country_of_origin FROM paint_manufacturers WHERE country_of_origin='USA' AND manufacturer_name LIKE '%Co%';
SELECT color_name, quantity, price FROM paint_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT color_name, rating, review_text FROM paint_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY color_name ASC;
